Ffydd ddi-ffvant adroddiad o helynt y grefydd gristnogol er dechreuad y byd hyd yr oes hon, a phrofiad oi gwirionedd. Edwards, Charles, 1627 or 8-1691?
[4], 89, [1] p.
Printiedig yn rhydychen gan Hen. Hall, Oxon : 1667.
Transliterated title: The unfeigned faith. Attributed to Edwards by Wing. Reproduction of original in the National Library of Wales.
=======
